Message:
we stood at the throne,
promising to end each other’s
lives with our own hands.

One sword endowed with
the authority to slay kings,

and one that embodies
the loyalty and pride
of a knight.

Weapons that would stop
us dead in our tracks,
should one of us go astray.

To me, that promise was
an unbreakable bond between
Queen Amleth and I.

An ironclad oath in which
we promised to protect
each other.

I never thought there would
come a time when I would
wish for this promise to
be fulfilled.
